mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT R.rno, R.num, R.replytext,R.replyer, R.regdate, R.updatedate, I.path FROM board_trip_reply R LEFT OUTER JOIN memberimg I ON R.replyer = I.id WHERE R.num = #{num} ORDER BY rno DESC
SELECT * FROM board_trip_reply WHERE num = #{num} ORDER BY rno DESC
SELECT COUNT(num) FROM board_trip_reply WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_trip_reply(num, replytext, replyer) VALUES (#{num}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_trip_reply SET replytext = #{replytext}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE rno = #{rno}
